entry.definition: a particular kind of matter with uniform properties

examples.text: a steel tube coated with a waxy substance

entry.definition: the real physical matter of which a person or thing consists and which has a tangible, solid presence

examples.text: proteins compose much of the actual substance of the body

entry.definition: the quality of being important, valid, or significant

examples.text: he had yet to accomplish anything of substance

entry.definition: the essential nature underlying phenomena, which is subject to changes and accidents.
